philosophy.title: Design Philosophy & Principles
philosophy.description: Arknights: Endfield embraces a Sci-Fi Industrial Futurism aesthetic — a blend of cold high-tech world with the frontier atmosphere of planet Talos-II.

dark_first.title: DARK-FIRST
dark_first.desc: Entire interface built on dark base, operational terminal feel

geometric.title: GEOMETRIC PRECISION
geometric.desc: Sharp lines, firm angles (clip-path instead of border-radius)

utilitarian.title: UTILITARIAN ELEGANCE
utilitarian.desc: Functional and technical yet elegant — mission control dashboard

glitch.title: GLITCH & TECH
glitch.desc: Glitch effects, scanlines, noise as sci-fi decoration

contrast.title: HIGH CONTRAST
contrast.desc: Light text on dark surfaces, accent colors for hierarchy

principles.name: Function-First
principles.desc: Every visual element has a purpose

principles.name: Data Density
principles.desc: Dense yet organized information — HUD style

principles.name: Progressive Disclosure
principles.desc: Information revealed gradually, not all at once

principles.name: Immersive Consistency
principles.desc: All elements feel like they belong to the same 'world'

principles.name: Tactile Feedback
principles.desc: Every interaction has clear visual response

colors.title: Color System
colors.description: Primary palette based on grayscale with yellow accent as the main brand color.

typography.title: Typography
typography.description: Font stack: Orbitron (display/UI), JetBrains Mono (code), Inter (body).

spacing.title: Spacing & Grid
spacing.description: Base 4px spacing scale. Container max 1280px, 12-column grid.

surfaces.title: Background & Surface
surfaces.description: Surface levels from Canvas to Active, with corner brackets as the Endfield signature element.

icons.title: Iconography
icons.description: Outlined blueprint aesthetic. Stroke 1.5px at 24px, currentColor.

illustration.title: Illustration & Imagery Style
illustration.description: Photography desaturated, cool-toned. Line art thin geometric, wireframe, blueprint style.
